DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate effectiveness , safety feasibility additional acupuncture therapy lung cancer patient chemotherapy inpatient setting . The acupuncture therapy administer resting period cycle chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Additional Acupuncture Therapy Lung Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: At least 18 year age Karnofsky Performance Status ( KPS ) 60 % Undergoing antineoplastic chemotherapy lung cancer Able provide inform consent Brain metastasis , stroke major psychiatric disease Active infection Severe heart disease Serious systemic disease uncontrolled hypertension diabetes mellitus Acupuncture therapy within previous three month Communication disorder Unwillingness participate trial Severe immunocompromised state ( absolute neutrophil count < 1000/cubic mm )
